title: Matrix Power Grid
statement: Dr. Wells needs to analyze a power grid represented as an N×M matrix. Each cell contains a power level. Find the maximum power that can be collected by moving from the top-left corner to the bottom-right corner, where you can only move right or down.
input: The first line contains two integers N and M (1 ≤ N, M ≤ 100). The next N lines each contain M integers representing the power levels in the grid (1 ≤ power ≤ 100).
output: Print the maximum power that can be collected.
